Identification_Area.title: Osservatorio Astronomico della Reg. Aut. Valle D'Aosta

Modification_Detail.description: Updated schema version. Adding missing "instrument" references. Adding missing "telescope" references.

The Osservatorio Astronomico della Reg. Aut. Valle D'Aosta, located in the Aosta Valley, Italy, is an important research center specializing in astrophysics and observational astronomy. It is recognized for its work in exoplanet studies, stellar astrophysics, and public outreach.

Facility.name: Osservatorio Astronomico della Reg. Aut. Valle D'Aosta
Facility.address: FONDAZIONE CLEMENT FILLIETROZ - ONLUS Loc. Lignan, 39 11020 NUS (AO) Italy
